title: Combined Schema for Classes A and C
description: This schema defines the validation rules for objects corresponding to classes A and C, which inherit from a base class B.

name.description: The name property must be a string with no leading/trailing whitespace and only a single space between words.

description.description: The description property can be a string or null.

A.description: Schema for class A, which extends B and adds a price.

price.description: The price must be a number greater than or equal to 0.0.

C.description: Schema for class C, which extends B and adds amount and availability.

amount.description: The 'amount' property must be an integer.
When 'available' is false, 'amount' must be at least 1.
